params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>15</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 15</annotation></semantics></math>,  <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>d</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>7</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d = 7</annotation></semantics></math> , calculate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>s</mi>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>10</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{s_{10}}</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus:
For the following exercises, the first term and the constant difference is given for an arithmetic sequence. Use that information to find the sum of the first <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n</annotation></semantics></math> terms of the sequence, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>s</mi>
      <mi>n</mi>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{s_n}</annotation></semantics></math>.
